nodes.text: Imperial Corrections was an organization within the Sith Empire under the Sphere of Laws and Justice that oversaw the Empire's prisons and prisoner transfers. Captain Heedley was an officer in Imperial Corrections, and he oversaw the transfer—and later recovery—of the Weequay pirate Vomba, who escaped briefly in Mezenti Spaceport on Nar Shaddaa during the transfer thanks to his pirate allies.
